user_instruction: 'Assist me in crafting a response to Dr. Emily Harris (emily.harris@greenleafwellness.org) with some guidance on handling anxiety disorders. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Anxiety Disorder Guidance Materials (for email to Dr. Emily Harris)

Hi [Recipient Name],

I hope you’re doing well. I’m preparing a detailed reply to Dr. Emily Harris (emily.harris@greenleafwellness.org) with practical guidance on treating anxiety disorders. Could you please pull together the most relevant material from my Notion workspace, including:

• Evidence-based protocols (e.g., CBT, ACT, exposure therapy)  
• Handouts or worksheets for clients (breathing exercises, grounding techniques, worry logs, etc.)  
• Any recent research summaries or case notes that highlight successful interventions  
• Tips for tailoring treatment plans to intern-level therapists

If it’s easier, feel free to drop the links directly or tag me on the Notion pages. A quick outline or bullet-point summary would also be helpful.

Thank you in advance for your help!

Best,  
John

final_output:
